DataElement.preferredName: Cancer Therapeutic Procedure Prior To Imaging Ind
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response for questions addressing treatment(s) for cancer prior to the imaging procedure.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cancer Therapeutic Procedure Prior To Imaging Technique
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any intervention for management of a malignant neoplasm._Earlier in time or order._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._Any technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any intervention for management of a malignant neoplasm.

Concepts.definition: Any intervention for management of a malignant neoplasm.

Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.:Any technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy.

Concepts.definition: Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.
Any technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 7/15/15 edit to DEC and released/tt_9/10/13 curated for 6702. tt

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, Unknown, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.
